tasks.title: Define recipe TypeScript types from schema
tasks.description: Create TypeScript interfaces/types for the full recipe schema: Recipe, RecipeSource, RecipeTags, Servings, and related types.

tasks.title: Implement ULID generation for recipe IDs
tasks.description: Add ULID dependency and create a utility for generating recipe IDs.

tasks.title: Build YAML frontmatter parser
tasks.description: Parse Markdown files with YAML frontmatter into structured Recipe objects. Handle the frontmatter/body split.

tasks.title: Build YAML frontmatter serializer
tasks.description: Serialize a Recipe object back into a Markdown file with YAML frontmatter.

tasks.title: Implement frontmatter validation
tasks.description: Validate all frontmatter fields per spec: ULID format, title length, slug format, servings positivity, ISO 8601 durations, difficulty enum, source.type enum, tag format regex.

tasks.title: Implement Markdown body validation
tasks.description: Validate that the body contains required ## Ingredients and ## Instructions sections with at least one list item each, and that total body size is under 50,000 characters.

tasks.title: Implement slug generation with collision avoidance
tasks.description: Generate URL-safe slugs from recipe titles. Handle collisions by appending -2, -3, etc. Regenerate slug on title change.

tasks.title: Implement on-save logic (updatedAt, totalTime calc)
tasks.description: On save: set updatedAt to current time, recalculate totalTime from prepTime + cookTime if both present and totalTime not explicitly set.

tasks.title: Define tag taxonomy constants and validation
tasks.description: Create constants for built-in tag groups (cuisine, meal, diet, technique, custom) and validate tag values against the regex /^[a-z0-9-]{1,50}$/ with max 20 tags per group.

tasks.title: Write unit tests for recipe data model
tasks.description: Test parsing, serialization, validation (valid and invalid cases), slug generation, on-save logic, and tag validation.
